name: Spirit
description: A standard ghost with no unique strengths but remains a persistent threat.
ability: No unique ability but hunts regularly.

name: Wraith
description: A supernatural entity that can teleport to players and avoids leaving traces.
ability: Never leaves footprints in salt; teleports to targets.

name: Phantom
description: A ghost that distorts vision and rapidly drains sanity when observed.
ability: Drains sanity when looked at; disappears during hunts when taken a photo.
weakness: Taking a photo makes it vanish.

name: Poltergeist
description: A mischievous ghost that thrives on chaos by throwing objects violently.
ability: Throws multiple objects at once.

name: Banshee
description: A ghostly hunter that fixates on one target at a time, often singing before it strikes.
ability: Targets one player at a time; sings often.

name: Jinn
description: A territorial entity that becomes significantly faster when chasing its prey.
ability: Moves faster when a player is far away.

name: Mare
description: A creature of darkness that thrives in unlit areas and is more aggressive at night.
ability: Prefers darkness; more likely to turn off lights.
weakness: Turning on lights reduces its aggression.

name: Revenant
description: A slow-moving ghost that turns into a relentless predator when it spots its prey.
ability: Moves extremely fast when chasing but slow otherwise.

name: Shade
description: A shy ghost that avoids revealing itself, making detection difficult.
ability: Less active with multiple people nearby.
weakness: Hard to find due to low activity.

name: Demon
description: A ruthless ghost that is unrelenting and can hunt at unusually high sanity levels.
ability: Hunts more frequently than other ghosts.

name: Yurei
description: A vengeful spirit that exerts a strong mental influence, draining sanity faster than others.
ability: Drains sanity faster than others.

name: Oni
description: A highly aggressive ghost that reveals itself more often and interacts frequently.
ability: More visible and throws objects often.
weakness: More active with multiple players nearby.

name: Yokai
description: A ghost drawn to human voices, increasing its aggression when players speak nearby.
ability: Can’t hear players from far but hunts more with talking.

name: Hantu
description: A ghost that thrives in the cold, becoming faster in low temperatures.
ability: Moves faster in colder environments.

name: Goryo
description: A ghost that only manifests in the D.O.T.S projector when viewed through a camera.
ability: Only appears on DOTS through a camera.
weakness: Does not roam far from its room.

name: Myling
description: A stealthy ghost that is nearly silent during hunts but makes loud noises otherwise.
ability: Quieter when hunting.

name: Onryo
description: A spirit of vengeance that grows aggressive when fire is extinguished nearby.
ability: Extinguishing flames increases hunt chances.

name: The Twins
description: A pair of ghosts that can interact with different locations at the same time.
ability: Two entities with independent interactions.

name: Raiju
description: A ghost that feeds on electrical energy, increasing its speed around active devices.
ability: Becomes faster near electronics.

name: Obake
description: A deceptive spirit that can alter its fingerprints and change evidence.
ability: Occasionally changes its evidence (e.g., extra fingerprints).

name: The Mimic
description: A mysterious ghost that imitates the abilities of other spirits and creates false Ghost Orbs.
ability: Mimics other ghosts, including their evidence.
weakness: Gives 4 evidence. Fake Evidence: Ghost Orb.

name: Moroi
description: A cursed spirit that weakens its victims by draining sanity at an alarming rate.
ability: Sanity drain is extreme; speeds up based on sanity.

name: Deogen
description: A ghost that relentlessly tracks its prey but moves slowly when close.
ability: Always knows where you are but is extremely slow.

name: Thaye
description: A ghost that starts off aggressive but weakens over time as it ages.
ability: Starts aggressive but weakens over time.
